name: My Twinkle Mat - The BEST Foot Placement Mat available.
description: The Twinkle MatTM has been meticulously designed to provide effortlessly effective foot placement practice and optimal positioning for developing the essential habit of good posture. The rhythms are easy to read for you and your child. The foot placement is clear and easy to understand. The notations of the strings are located to the left, under the violin when in position. There are bow hand and violin hand reminders located slightly behind them so as to not be in line of sight. The Twinkle MatTM is made from lightweight high-density PVC foam (the same material as most yoga mats.) It is only 2mm thick and weights less than ½ lb. It will not slip and slide while your child is standing on it and will not curl or tear. It is also washable. The Twinkle MatTM comes in 3 sizes. Small, Medium and Large. The size designation is for your child’s foot size and height. Height and correct foot placement is correlated to shoe size so please note and order accordingly. Small is for most 2.5 - 4 year olds. US Shoe sizes 6.5 – 8 Medium is for most 4 – 5 year olds. US Shoe sizes 8.5 -10 Large is for most 5- 6+ year olds. US Shoe sizes 10.5 – 13 If your child is on the cusp – say a size 8 – order the medium. They grow quickly. You can always order another mat next year as your child grows. As long as your child falls within the size range, the foot placement will be appropriate for them. Make practice time a treat with a cheery and bright Twinkle Mat! You will be glad you did! All three sizes of the Twinkle Mat physically measure 18 x 30 x 1/16th inches. For a quick note about the nomenclature used and why, please see our FAQ page or click here. This is product is exclusively available from TwinkleMat.com Please feel free to contact us with any questions.

name: Foam-A-Lin Practice Violin
description:
Our foam-a-lins are ideal for the pre-twinkler wanting the optimal aid with which to begin their violin adventures.  Made from durable foam, our Foam-a-lin Foam Violin is ideal for teaching them the proper posture and bow movement. It has an attached foam chin rest and shoulder rest and comes with a wooden dowel bow with a simulated frog and is flat on one side ( unlike some bows that are completely cylindrical). Comes in all appropriate sizing and colors may vary. 

Regularly priced at $23.00

Please select 1/32, 1/16 or 1/10 size or 1/4.    

Sizes for 3 years and under is usually the 1/32,  
4 years = 1/16 
and 5+ years = 1/10.

name: Starter Kit - Everything you need for your first class.
description: This kit was put together so you could buy one item, get everything you need, and save a lot of time and money in the process. The "My First Violin Case" is designed to be colored in and personalized by your child. (available only at Twinklemat.com) The starter kit contains everything your child needs for their first class: • A Twinkle Mat (in their size) • A Foam-a-lin & Bow (in their size) • Suzuki Violin Book 1 and CD • Nurtured by Love by S. Suzuki (the book) • A Complimentary set of Which Hand? Temporary Tattoos • My First 100 Days Practice Chart (with stickers) and Completion Award Certificate • All contained in a lightweight carry case with customizable cover sticker. Only a moderate amount of care is needed to be sure this sturdy case will easily last them through their entire pre-twinkler phase. The case measures 18 1/4 x 11 3/8 x 2 11/16" and is constructed of white cardboard with a plastic a carrying handle and has a self-closing design. These items, if purchased separately, would cost over $100.00 (not to mention all the various shipping charges)

options.name: Small Twinkle Mat & 1/32 size foam-a-lin (2.5 -4 yrs old)
Medium Twinkle Mat & 1/16 size foam-a-lin (4-5 yrs old)
Large Twinkle Mat & 1/10 size foam-a-lin (5-6  yrs old)

name: 100 Days - Practice Chart and Certificate
description:
This is just what every beginner needs to stay on track. Chart their first 100 Days of practice, all while creating a keepsake and establishing the best possible practice habits. The kit comes with:

• The MY FIRST 100 DAYS CHART

• 100 Red Foil Star Stickers

• and a delightfully colorful Award Certificate (which their teacher may present to them upon completion)


There is a place on the chart to document their name, start date, completion date and notes to remember. We recommend embellishing it with memories and making it a keepsake for their scrapbook. The Award Certificate has a place for their name, is titled " My 100 Days Award"... This Certificate is Presented to ... for having successfully completed 100 days of violin practice... You completed your goal on this date... Your Teacher. If you are a teacher and would like to order in quantities- either or both items - please email me.

name: Suzuki Violin School Violin Part, Volume 1 Book & CD
description: Contents are: Principles of Study and Guidance * Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star Variations (Shinichi Suzuki) * Lightly Row (Folk Song) * Song of the Wind (Folk Song) * Go Tell Aunt Rhody (Folk Song) * O Come, Little Children (Folk Song) * May Song (Folk Song) * Long, Long Ago (T.H. Bayly) * Allegro (Shinichi Suzuki) * Perpetual Motion (Shinichi Suzuki) * Allegretto (Shinichi Suzuki) * Andantino (Shinichi Suzuki) * Etude (Shinichi Suzuki) * Minuet 1, Minuett III from Suite in G Minor for Klavier, BWV 822 (J.S. Bach) * Minuet 2, Minuet, BWV Anh. II 116 from Notebook for Anna Magdalena Bach (J.S. Bach) * Minuet 3, Minuet BWV Anh. II 114/Anh. III 183 (J.S. Bach) * The Happy Farmer from Album for the Young, Op. 68, No. 10 (R. Schumann) * Gavotte (F.J. Gossec). Revised edition features: New engravings in a 9" x 12" format New editing of pieces, including bowings and fingerings 16 additional pages Additional exercises, some from Dr. Suzuki, plus additional insight and suggestions for teachers Glossary of terms in English, French, German and Spanish Musical notation guide Fingerboard position New photos CD features new recordings by Bill Preucil, Jr and piano accompaniments recorded without the violin part.
